required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Levonorgestrel-releasing Intrauterine System for the Treatment of Symptomatic Adenomyosis
clinical_study.official_title: Cohort Study of Levonorgestrel-releasing Intrauterine System for the Treatment of Symptomatic Adenomyosis

brief_summary.textblock:
Objective: To investigate the effects of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system (LNG-IUS) for symptomatic adenomyosis.
Methods: From December, 2006 to December, 2014, symptomatic patients of adenomyosis diagnosed (with dysmenorrhea and/or menorrhea) by transvaginal ultrasound in outpatient or inpatient clinics of Peking Union Medical College Hospital were given the treatment of LNG-IUS. Before and after placement of LNG-IUS, during each following period, all the parameters were recorded prospectively, including carrying status of IUS, symptoms and scores of dysmenorrhea, menstruation scores, biochemical indicators, physical parameters, menstruation patterns and adverse effects.
Primary outcome measures: symptoms and scores of dysmenorrhea and menorrhea
Second outcome measures: carrying status of IUS

primary_outcome.measure: improvement of symptoms of adenomyosis assessed by change from baseline visual analogue scale at 5 years after placement of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system
primary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after placement of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system

secondary_outcome.measure: unplanned taking-out rate in percent of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after placement of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system

secondary_outcome.measure: spontaneously expulsion rate in percent of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after placement of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system

secondary_outcome.measure: improvement of symptoms of adenomyosis assessed by verbal rating scales for pain
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after placement of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system

secondary_outcome.measure: improvement of symptoms of adenomyosis assessed by hemoglobin for menorrhea
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after placement of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system

secondary_outcome.measure: improvement of symptoms of adenomyosis assessed by pictorial chart scores for menorrhea
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after placement of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system

intervention.description: All the patients accepted treatment of levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women with regular menses
- Adenomyosis diagnosed via transvaginal ultrasound
- With severe dysmenorrhea (VAS â‰¥ 7) and/or menorrhea (pictorial chart scores >100)
- Duration of placement > 12 months
- Size of uterus by physical examination less than uterus of 12-week pregnancy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Desire for pregnancy or lactation
- With diagnosis of malignancies or precancerous lesions
- Acceptance of laparotomy
- Contraindication of placing levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system

patient_data.ipd_description: IPD will be shared with researchers via online database
